faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q-1: Is it legal to exchange cryptocurrencies in Turkey?
faq.a-1: Yes, it is legal to buy, sell or trade your crypto money as long as crypto money is not used to pay goods or services.
faq.q-2: Do you accept debit cards or bank transfers or any form of online payment?
faq.a-2: No, we only work in cash and in person at our offices.
faq.q-3: What types of ID documents should I have to be able to make an exchange?
faq.a-3: You need to provide a valid passport or a European national ID or a Turkish ID or a new generation Turkish Driver’s license.
faq.q-4: Why do I need an ID?
faq.a-4: Since March 2021, we are under the obligation to process customer identity verification as determined by Turkish legislation. This is aimed at fighting financial crime and illegal activities.
faq.q-5: Which cryptocurrencies can I buy or sell at BJB Exchange?
faq.a-5: You can buy or sell any crypto that is available on Binance. Please contact the office branch you wish to make the transaction at.
